descriptionHtml:
I don\'t know about you but personally I found it a bit annoying that when you start a game you have to work your way through the starting dungeon to get appropriate gear.. Missing out on valuable skill points. This mod fixes that by adding armour sets for most character types to the very starting areas for both stormcloaks and imperials so you still have the freedom of choice.

This mod should not conflict with most others unless they have by a very small chance placed something where I have.
author: WORLDSHATTER
